title: GPS location not always being saved in Pixel3a pictures.
content:
In looking back through the last thousand picture I took with Pixel 3A, I see that only a few percent of them include GPS location data in the EXIF.  Some even half worked -- there is a GPS group in the EXIF, but no lat/long/etc in it.

The issue is somewhat random -- two out of 20 have GPS one day, non have GPS for a week or two.  One time I had zero location data for a few hundred pictures, then for the next few hundred, about 95% worked.  Then off again.

Another curiosity -- all panorama pictures seem to have GPS location data.

Smells like a bug.  Can someone confirm?  Can someone fix?
